channel.title: SWS: What's So Tempting About the Dark Side (2 March Sunday mornings)
channel.description:
![](upload://u3vALVqfjAe2T87H4ELQmDzN4WM.png)
This game is about force users struggling between the dark and light sides of the force. The dark side continuously tempts force users with access to power, but it's insidious and it corrupts. The more you use the dark side, the closer you will slip toward your doom...
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is *after* the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's *Return of the Jedi* ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and will be added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).
**CW: Violence, power abuse, death, and lack of bodily autonomy.** **System** : What's So Cool about... **Duration** : two 3 hour sessions **Breaks** : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins) **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent is given by all players **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is recommended. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open-door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2022-03-06 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2022-03-06 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MsMWl3E74DvABTY1IsT) [date=2022-03-13 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2022-03-13 time=12:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MsMWmCtDizhrf7b6VuW)

item.title: SWS: What's So Tempting About the Dark Side (2 March Sunday mornings)
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

590×911 561 KB

This game is about force users struggling between the dark and light sides of the force. The dark side continuously tempts force users with access to power, but it’s insidious and it corrupts. The more you use the dark side, the closer you will slip toward your doom…

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is after the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and will be added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).

CW: Violence, power abuse, death, and lack of bodily autonomy.
System : What’s So Cool about…
Duration : two 3 hour sessions
Breaks : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins)
Venue : GM’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only if consent is given by all players
Attendance : Joining all sessions is recommended. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open-door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.

Sunday, March 6, 2022 2:00 PM → Sunday, March 6, 2022 5:00 PM Session 1
Sunday, March 13, 2022 1:00 PM → Sunday, March 13, 2022 4:00 PM Session 2
